Winter 2026 Resilience Sequence

Four consecutive weeks of hands-on workshops covering energy, climate, communication, and transport. Join a cohort of fellow learners and build practical skills for resilience.

Location: Greater Boston Area
Dates: February 2026 (specific dates TBD)
Price: $275 ($250 early bird)

The Workshops

‚ö° Energy

A Gentle Introduction to Off-Grid Power

Learn the basics of making, storing and using electrical energy at home - for kids and adults. (Image: Taufik 2022)

DIY Air Filtration

Build your own affordable, effective air purifier using the Corsi-Rosenthal box design

Easy Off-Grid Mesh Radio

Build long-range wireless networks that work without internet or cell service
üè† Shelter

DIY Bike Trailers

Build a low-cost cargo bike trailer from readily-available hardware store materials

What's Included

  • All four workshops (normally ~$320 if taken separately)
  • Materials for all projects
  • Take-home: solar charger, air filter, mesh radio, bike trailer
  • Certificate of completion for the Resilience Foundations credential
